title: Illusion card
data:
{{Version027}} {{flavour|The card depicts someone standing in a hall of mirrors, surrounded by their own reflections.}} The Illusion card summons an illusion of the player to fight alongside them, much like [[Mara]]'s [[Summon Illusion|ability]]. The illusion is armed identically to the player. Higher card power increases the duration of the illusion.
